ygData.subject: Flicker to Rodimus
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Carhead couldn t remember where he put Flicker last, so I m going to put him in the shield generators, examining them. BIC:  Flicker typed at the console

OOC: Carhead couldn't remember where he put Flicker last, so I'm 
going to put him in the shield generators, examining them.

BIC:  Flicker typed at the console bringing up the shield readout.

Flicker:  Hmmmm....Oh my oh my.....this should suit my plans nicely.

  He glimpsed around to make sure noone was coming and then typed in 
a simulation of decreasing the power at several points, and 
refocusing it at others, and then firing on the base.  For a few 
moments the shield seems to have improved, but then Flicker types in 
an exact point for the computer to hit and the shield blows open 
(please note, this is just a computer simulation, so hence I'm not 
moding).
  Flicker turns off the simulation and reaches for his comm unit and 
opens a commlink to Rodimus.

Flicker:  Flicker calling Rodimus.  Repeat Flicker calling Rodimus.
